thread.section_title: Auto Lenders Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Auto Lenders | autolenders.com
thread.title: Pat Yuncza Geurds
thread.title_full: Auto Lenders reviewed by Pat Yuncza Geurds

author: Pat Yuncza Geurds
title: Pat Yuncza Geurds
text: My sales man Stephen Washington was very kind and by listening to our wants and needs he easily found us the perfect car . He explained the process and put all the financing in motion seamlessly. It was by far my best experience purchasing a car. I owe it all to Stephen. He was very knowledgable and he made us laugh. It was a lighthearted exchange and I feel so grateful to Stephen for sending us home today wth our new car.
